flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.summary: With this mousetrap, home owners can get rid of their rodent problems in a more humane way. A piece of cheese is placed inside the container with the trap lid set. Once a mouse enters, the lid will go off and trap the mouse inside, setting off the electri
guide.title: Catch-a-Mouse
